scenario_1.persona_desc: A puzzle enthusiast who enjoys creating and solving challenging mosaics, especially those that require unique tile arrangements and tile orientations. They are skilled in using congruent triangles to double tile mosaics, and are interested in exploring new and innovative tile configurations that defy the traditional guidelines. They are curious about the possibility of double tiling mosaics with fewer than 901 sections and those that disregard some of the above guidelines.

responses.thought: I am person B. Both options give me $400. I will pick the option that gives the most money to person A, which is Right.
